name: Pachinko Adventures
description:
A game universe based on famous japanese game, the Pachinko ! (PC and Android)

- Multi objectives missions.

- Travel in different countries all over the world and discover their monuments and population.

- Seek and found secret levels..

- Enjoy 8-bit / 16-bit chiptune musics.

- Play with many oldschool hand-held consoles interfaces.

- Multi scoring system with competitive world rank.

- Unlockable characters, countries, levels and much more..

See ya!

Takido & Yoshindo from "RiseOf" Youtube channel.
